name: ‘Ndrangheta
description: The ‘Ndrangheta was during the last decades the most powerful Italian mafia. The word seems to be derived from the Greek andragathía (courage). It has its power structures in Calabria, especially in the capital Reggio Calabria, located in the Strait of Messina. Although it has apparently been around for more than a century, it has only become more visible since the 1950s. The small town of Santa Luca in the Calabria region counts as the ‘sanctuary’ of gangsters, where the entire population is on the same side.
